questions.question: After Rajendra Chola returned from his voyage to Indonesia, he ______ to visit the temple in Thanjavur.
Research in the workplace reveals that people work for many reasons _______

Rahul, Murali, Srinivas and Arul are seated around a square table. Rahul is sitting to the left of Murali. Srinivas is sitting to the right of Arul. Which of the following pairs are seated adjacent to each other?
Find the smallest number y such that y^162 is a perfect cube.
The probability that a 6-digit number does NOT contain the digits 0, 5, or 9 is

Six people are seated around a circular table. There are at least five men and two women. There are at least three right-handed persons. We know a left-handed person is seated immediately to the right. None of the women are right-handed. The number of men at the table is
The expression (x+y) − |x−y| is equal to
options: (A) The maximum of x and y
(B) The minimum of x and y
questions.answer: (B) The minimum of x and y

questions.question: Arun, Gulab, Neel, and Shweta must each choose one shirt from a pile of four shirts colored pink, blue, white, and red, respectively. Arun dislikes the color red, and Shweta dislikes the color pink, but they have no other preferences. In how many different ways can they choose the shirts so that no one gets a shirt in a color they dislike?
